## coastal protection reef trend

[cp_hab_trend_mhi2017](https://github.com/OHI-Science/mhi/blob/master/region2017/layers/)

The estimated change in percent coral cover calculated from the past 5 years of available monitoring data from NOAA Coral Reef Ecosystem Program.

### Reference

[NOAA CREP 2017 Report](https://www.pifsc.noaa.gov/cred/monitoring_status_reports.php)
